rules.description: On Escape, also Clear the Warp, Super, and Ghost states
Cmd-W to close Window inside a RDP session (, = dvorak w)
Z,/ to Z,/ when tapped, Ghost when held
Ghost-8,3 (*,#) move Next / Prev Match
Ghost-/ to Search ([ = dvorak /)
Ghost-[,] to Prev / Next Paragraph (-,equal = dvorak [,])
Ghost-W,B,0,4 move Horizontally (comma,n = dvorak w,b)

manipulators.description: Ghost-B move to Beginning of Word
Ghost-0 move to Start of Line
Ghost-4 ($) move to End of Line

rules.description: Ghost-U,D to move Up / Down Page (f,h = dvorak u,d)
Ghost-G Go to Bottom of Document (u = dvorak g)
Ghost-H,J,K,L move Down (j,c,v,p dvorak h,j,k,l)
Ghost-P to Paste with Maccy (r = dvorak p)
Ghost-T move to Top of Document (k = dvorak t)
Ghost-V to Paste with No Formatting (. = dvorak v)
Ghost-X Delete Forward (b = dvorak x)
Tab to Tab when tapped, Super when held
Super-0 to Close All Apps
Super-[ to Decrease Window size (- = dvorak [)
Super-] to Increase Window size (equal = dvorak ])
Super-B to go Back to prev Desktop (n = dvorak b)
Super-F to go Forward to next Desktop (y = dvorak f)
Super-H to Snap Window left (j = dvorak h)
Super-L to Snap Window right (p = dvorak l)
Super-/ to Snap Window 2/3 ([ = dvorak /)
Super-C to Center Window (i = dvorak c)
Super-M to almost Maximize Window (m = dvorak m)
Super-R to Restore Window size (o = dvorak r)
Super-S to Silence (minimize) other Windows (; = dvorak s)
Super-Z to Zoom Window (/ = dvorak z)
Caps Lock to Esc when tapped, Warp when held
Warp-/ to Search Mac ([ = dvorak /)
Warp-6 (^) to toggle Karabiner Elements and its Event Viewer
Warp-7 to open e-Sword
Warp-8 to open Music, to take Flow State to Warp Factor 8
Warp-9 to dial out with Google Voice
Warp-B to open Books (n = dvorak b)
Warp-C to open ChatGPT (i = dvorak c)
Warp-D to toggle Dictionary and WordWeb (h = dvorak d)
Warp-F to open Finder (y = dvorak f)
Warp-G to open GitHub (u = dvorak g)
Warp-H to open next Cheatsheet (j = dvorak h)
Warp-K to open Google Kalena (v = dvorak k)
Warp-M to open Google Mail
Warp-P to Ping Messages (r = dvorak p)
Warp-R to open Remote Desktop (o = dvorak r)
Warp-S to open Safari (semicolon = dvorak s)
Warp-T to open Things (k = dvorak t)
Warp-U to open UTM (f = dvorak u)
Warp-V to open VSCode (. = dvorak v)
Warp-W to open Warp (comma = dvorak w)
Warp-Y to open YouTube (t = dvorak y)
Warp-Z to open ZK Terminal (/ = dvorak z)
GASC Home Row Mods
